personal-assistant.title: Personal Assistant
personal-assistant.description: A personal assistant developed using the OpenAI API, capable of conversing with you and responding in an AI-generated voice.

crypto-app.title: Crypto App
crypto-app.description: A list of cryptos with their prices and additional information. You can connect your Metamask wallet and preview your balance.

mag-thebay.title: Mag-Thebay ONG Site
mag-thebay.description: A site for the Mag-Thebay ONG. It is a single page application with a list of projects posted with MDX.

wen.title: Wen.sh
wen.description: Landing page for a web3 project of web3 builders that builds web3 tools to help web3 builders build web3 tools.

personal-card.title: Personal Card
personal-card.description: Made with JavaScript Native WebComponents in order to undestand them. Pretty simple project, but it helped me to understand components based apps.

advice-generator.title: Advice Generator (Frontend Mentor challenge)
advice-generator.description: Very simple project that I focused on developing as quickly as possible. It took me about an hour to complete it.
